{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AppNeta m35 microAppliance |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = AppNeta_PathView_microAppliance_m35 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = AppNeta |model = PathView microAppliance |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = m35 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = network security platform |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PD97260H |icid = 1000M-7260H |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C2518; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Compact Flash |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Transcend;; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CMOS Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = Transcend;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1543; |eth3chip = Intel;WG1210AT; |eth4chip = Intel;WG1210AT; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = SATA 3.0, CompactFlash, Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, TPM, buzzer, power switch, metal case, heatsink |addchip = LPC I/O Controller;Winbond;W83627DHG;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, 256K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25256B;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, ATA to Serial ATA Bi-direction Bridge;Sunplus Tech;SPIF223A;;1;,,, 3+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95831;;1;,,, 3V 16Mbit Serial Flash Memory w/<!--Dual And Quad--> SPI;Winbond;W25Q16DVSFIG;;2;,,, Clock Generator for Intel microServers;Renesas;9VRS4420D;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module LPC Interface;Infineon;SLB9635TT;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;1;,,, Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS3669S;;4;,,, 4.5V-17V<!--> Input-->, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54320;;1;,,, Single-Phase D-CAP<!--/CAP2--> Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51518;;1;,,, Single-Synchronous Step-Down Controller<!--w/ Differential Voltage Feedback-->;TI;TPS51219;;1;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51225;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7620S;;2;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7694;;2;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, 3A LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Lanner |manuf_model = FW-7525C |manuf_rev = AP1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/04/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 (7260HMW) |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad1chip1 = Intel;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2518 @1.7GHz (Quad-Core) *Memory: 8GB DDR3 (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :16GB Transcend CompactFlash, SATA 3.0 port *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.lannerinc.com/support/download-center/category/16-network-appliances?download=97:fw-7525-user-manual OEM User Manual]
